info.name: API Time Manager
info.description:
Time Manager API.
Used in the Time Manager project for the Epitech MSC 2023 Pool.
Routes root are : http://localhost:4000/api/

item.name: Users
Get User By Email And Username

request.description:
Return a JSON with information about a user.
Take an email and a username as query parameter.

response.name: Get User By Email And Username

variable.description: ID of the user to find

request.description:
Return a JSON with information about a user.
Take a user ID as query parameter.

item.name: Get Team Members By Team ID

request.description: Return JSON informations of all users for a given team.

response.name: Get Team Members By Team ID

request.description:
Create a user.
Take a JSON body, with a username and email field inside a users object.
See left side documentation for an example.
Authenticate a user and return his JSON token.

Create a user.
Take a user ID as query parameter.

Delete a user in the DataBase.
Take a user ID as query parameter.

item.description:
All routes in http://localhost:4000/api/users/
Theses routes are used to perform actions with users.
You can create/delete or get informations on users.

item.name: Working Time
Get Working Time with ID start and end

request.description:
Get working time informations as JSON format which corresponds to given userID, start and end field.
UserID, Start and End are query parameters.

response.name: Get Working Time with ID start and end

item.name: Get Working Time By User ID

variable.description: ID of the user to find

request.description:
Return a working time informations as JSON.
Working time ID is sent by query parameter.

variable.description: ID of the user to find

request.description: This call returns a JSON format containing all current working times that are saved for all users.
Create a working time. Take the user ID of the working time in query parameter.
Create a working time. Take the working time id as query parameter.
Delete a working time. Take the working time ID to delete as query parameter.

item.description:
All routes in http://localhost:4000/api/workingtimes/
Theses routes are used to perform actions with working times.
You can create/delete or get informations on working times.

item.name: Clocking

request.description: Get the clock informations of a user. Take the user id as query parameter.

Create a clock for a user.
Take a user ID as query parameter.

item.description:
All routes in http://localhost:4000/api/clocks/
Theses routes are used to perform actions with clocks.
You can create/delete or get informations on clocks.

item.name: Charts

variable.description: ID of the user associated to the chart

request.description: Get all charts informations corresponding to a user.

variable.description: ID of the user associated to the chart
ID of the user associated to the chart

request.description: Create and save a new chart object from a User ID.

variable.description: ID of the user associated to the chart

request.description: Update a chart with informations passed by JSON.

item.description: Theses routes interacts whith charts informations.

item.name: Teams

variable.description: ID of the team to find
ID of the team to find
ID of the user ID to find the associated teams
ID of the user ID to find the associated teams

request.description: Return a JSON containing all teams stored with all their informations.
Create a team based on a JSON containing name, members and night_team of the team.

variable.description: ID of the team to update
ID of the team to update
ID of the team to delete

item.description: Folder containing all routes used to manage teams.
